q: is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. "Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time," he said. I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. We're going to go out and try to have fun and everybody enjoy each other. Michael Vick looked sharp and fluid as he completed a 20-yard out to Arizona Cardinals receiver Larry Fitzgerald . On the next play, Michael Vick faked a handoff to Adrian Peterson and then hit Falcons tight end Tony Gonzalez going across the middle.

President Bush . He served as Defense secretary and chief of staff to Gerald Ford and again led the Pentagon during the second President Bush presidency. Donald Rumsfeld was unapologetic about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the al Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he said. As in his book, Donald Rumsfeld was forthcoming with his criticism of public figures, including his fellow President Bush Cabinet members. Donald Rumsfeld said he was "kind of disappointed" in George H.W. Bush
